records.summary: Near encounter (100 feet) for 1 minute.
records.story: Near encounter (100 feet) for 1 min. Circular craft, white circular lights around perimeter, 100 feet above ground, seen through bedroom window, made very distinct humming noise, stayed stationary aprox. 1 min, disappeared in an instant with no notable noise, somewhat large, maybe 75-150 feet in diameter, unmistakable and unforgettable. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Star like craft with wings just hovering in one spot in the sky, airplanes flying near it and dogs are barking like crazy.
records.story: Star like craft with wings just hovering in one spot in the sky, airplanes flying near it and dogs are barking like crazy I’ve never seen anything quite like this. it’s like a very huge star but round in the middle and looks like it has wings.  It is bigger than airplanes.  I saw 2 airplanes near it and they seemed like 1/10th or far less than that, the size of whatever this thing is.  It looks like a star at first glance but you can see that it has some kind of wings.  It is perfectly round, like a classroom globe but shiny and with blue-ish wings, the rest is white or extremely shiny silver color. This was seen in the sky at 19:45-ish right now 19 September 2013.  Again, I don't know what this is, but it seems very large, too large to be a plain and much larger and nearer than any star I've ever seen.

records.summary: Disk and a small cluster of strange lights.
records.story: A disk and a small cluster of strange lights. I was looking up at the night sky during a blackout, when I saw what appeared to be one disk-like shape in the sky along with a small cluster of other lights.  They were there for about 6 seconds (hardly enough time to tack a picture) and then they were gone, just disappeared in a streak of light that lingered for hardly one second.

records.summary: Above Albuquerque, a very strange light has been flying in weird formations. It moves in small bursts, like a fly on a window. It is a
records.story: Above Albuquerque, a very strange light has been flying in weird formations.  It moves in small bursts, like a fly on a window. It is a white light that flickers almost like a star but differently.  It has been doing this for about an hour and is slowly getting higher.  I can look out the window and still see it. It looks like a strange star, but continues to move. Very weird. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Something fell to earth in new mexico last night, craft like.
records.story: Somthing fell to earth in new mexico lastnight, craft like. In the far  Northwest of the city Somthing not Human landed on earth.  I watched it fall leaving a thick trail only a second long.  The object was coming down so fast the breaking of air wads so clearly visible that it was clear somthing had fallen almost faster than my eye could record.  Very un natual

records.summary: A bright purple sphere Hoovers then uses some type of warp drive to dissappear.
records.story: A bright purple sphere Hoovers then uses some type of warp drive to dissappear While hunting in the manzano mountains a group of us encountered something that really freaked us out.  It was the first night at the manzanos.  Around 2230. My dad and his hunting friends were sitting around the campsite drinking and having a good time. I was 18 At the time. I was sitting there just staring at the mountain.  I heard some type of chanting in the canyon.  I listened for about 5 to 10 min then called Ron to come verify what I was hearing. He Heard it too.  We listened to it for 5 more min maybe. We began telling everyone to listen to what we were hearing.  Then next thing we see is what appeared to be a light.  Very small in size.  Looked like a flash light start at bottom of the mountain and began to make its way to the top.  It maybe took about 10 seconds to make it to the top. At that point everyone was focused on the small light.  Then what happened next scared us all.  Once the light made its way to the top about 5 seconds a purple sphere came from the top of the mountain and hovered there.  It was bright!! Looked like a flare at first.  That's what it reminded me of.  It was no flare thou.  It hovered for maybe 10 seconds .. It then got brighter then at a 45 degree angle shot off into space.  I guess..  It left a tail behind it.  Then was gone. Me and my dads hunting friends put the camp fire out.  And were in shock.  We all went inside our campers.  What we seen was some other type of technology.  That was maybe watching our planet.  Everyone will say the same thing.. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Large bright cylindical UFO observed for 15 min.   ((NUFORC Note:  Helium-filled balloon at high altitude.  PD))
records.story: Large bright cylindical UFO observed for 15 min. At approximately 1900 on 21 Sept 2013 I witnessed a very bright object in the sky and observed the object for 15 min, while on the University of New Mexico campus in Albuquerque, NM. I was at the student union (SUB) earlier and then I had an urge to go outside and look towards the east (Sandia Mountains).  It was approximately 1900 and the sun was setting.  The sky conditions were clear with no cloud cover in any direction northeast to southeast.  There was a flock of common house finches in the tree with a flurry of chirping at this time.  I had an urge to look towards the east and saw an extremely noticeable bright object in the sky.  The object was approximately 13-15 degrees in the sky and was bright white.  It was also in the form of a cylinder about so, I first though it was Comet ISON.  Of course that was ruled out as it is scheduled to pass in Nov, and then I ruled out aircraft types, and balloons.  The object remained in the same spot on the sky for the ent! ire duration of 15 min.  The object was as bright as a sewing pin head held at arm’s length for the duration.  It seemed to be above the traffic departure pattern at the airport, estimated at 15000’.  Aircraft traffic taking off towards the east did not seem to be near it vertically or horizontally; however, I can bet radar would have picked the object up. The object also seemed to be friendly and there were times during the duration I saw other smaller white objects around it for less than a second. When I asked if they could change colour they did at the time period of 12-15 min. The object became more circular and changed from bright white to red orange to red then faded out to look like a very dim white star. I did not observe the object after 15 min. I normally do not make reports unless the object is a bit more significant in scale/size/colour/duration; although I see objects usually once a week or more. I also have an extensive military aircraft background and have seen! objects of significance while on missions. Lastly, I want to ! give my sincere thanks to you for providing this service and thankful you are also featured on coast to coast often!

records.summary: Bright light hovering east of Albuquerque.  ((NUFORC Note:  Helium-filled balloon at high altitude.  PD))
records.story: Bright light hovering east of Albuquerque Bright light hovering to the east at dusk - it stayed motionless for a few minutes before moving quickly to the north, then stopping and maintaining its position for a few more minutes, then appeared to move away from us as the light became smaller and smaller until it disappeared. My friend took a photo, I will try to send it.

records.summary: Numerous blue white shimmering spheres moving rapidly from northwest to southeast over Albuquerque.
records.story: numerous blue white shimmering spheres moving rapidly from northwest to southeast over Albuquerque At approximately 17:40, while driving home along Unser Blvd NW, I observed a bright, but strangely short meteor enter to the northwest.  Impressed by how vivid this fireball was, I shortly put it out of my mind. At around 20:00 I had stepped outside of my westside Albuquerque home to have a cigarette and load items into the car for a weekend trip to Canjilon, NM.  Catching motion out of the corner of my eye, I glanced at the western sky and observed numerous shimmering balls of light crossing rapidly from northwest to southeast.  I promptly ran inside and called for my fiancee to step out as well in order that she could verify what I was observing.  I also retrieved my 60 power spotting scope.  She stepped out with me and we watched in amazement as these objects continued to stream across the sky.  Using my spotting scope, I was able to track one of these objects and was surprised to discover that the scope did not magnify it nearly as much as I would have expected.  I take this to mean that the objects were further away than my initial estimate.  The object I observed with the scope was circular, and while it appeared a bluish white to the naked eye, it seemed to be like a disco ba! ll-shimmering in many different colors.  I put the scope down and continued to observe with the naked eye until all of them had passed.  There was little if any noise from these objects aside from a faint "muttering" rumble.  Their movement was erratic and uncoordinated, with some of them traveling faster, and taking wavering paths, but all generally to the southeast.    They traveled very quickly-seemingly three times as fast as I would expect an aircraft to move at the same distance.  They  passed in three groups, with the majority of the objects comprising the lead group-almost reminiscent of the way race cars move about on a track.  I considered taking photographs or video, but considering the apparent size of the objects, their velocity, and the state of darkness at that time of night, video would have been inconclusive and photographs would have been nearly impossible.

records.summary: A brilliant, white, nonmoving light or orb seen in Eastern sky over Albuquerque for about 2 or more hours.
records.story: A brilliant, white, nonmoving light or orb seen in Eastern sky over Albuquerque for about 2 or more hours. September 22, 2013 UFO Over Albuquerque, NM   This morning at around 0600 my husband and I were walking in a park near our house.  On the way there we noticed a bright, white light in the eastern sky which appeared to be stationary over the mountains.  We thought the light would be gone quickly but it remained in the sky for about 2 hours or more. We called a local radio station to report it and the man who answered said he saw it too this morning but it looked red (most likely due to the sunrise).  He thought it was a planet but it was too large to be Venus or any other planet or star.  It was about one tenth the size of the moon seen in the Western sky. As we watched the object appeared to move higher in the sky but without much lateral motion. When we started our walk we talked to some balloonists who were getting ready to launch and they had been watching it for some time as well and said they didn’t know what it was but suspected it was a weather balloon. There were four balloons that launched in the park and they quickly moved north and out of sight, but the object over the mountains remained where it was without much movement up down or to either side. When we got home we looked at the object with binoculars of 30-50x and it appeared to be spherical, extremely brightly lit (since the sun was behind the mountains and hence behind the object).  It looked like the inside of a led flashlight with little brightly lit circles inside. Many at least three other people at the park saw the light but we did not get their names.  We took a photo with our camera phone which will be e-mailed to you but it was indistinct and showed no detail.

records.summary: Bright light on eastside of Albuquerque nm
records.story: bright light on eastside of Albuquerque nm I seen a very bright light. Looked like a circle at first. After looking more carefully it was triangle type. Looked alot like all seeing eye. Scared the crap outta me. It seemed to be moving very slow. As the sun began to rise it steadly rose with it. Very hard to see with the sun but was gone once the sun came All the way up. It stayed from 6:45 when i first noticed it while taking  My dogs out.  I was in a trance just staring. Was gone by 7:50. My husband laughed when i told him. Ill remember it forever. I can still see the object. In my memory of course. Oh yea I have pictures and in the pictures its sitting in a rainbow. The rainbow was not visible to me. Only in the picture. So wierd.

records.summary: Diamond formation of lights over Albuquerque.
records.story: Diamond formation of lights over Albuquerque I was walking out into the back yard around 3 am when I saw a group of lights heading westward over northern Albuquerque.   They flew in a diamond formation. Just as they reached the area directly in front of me, they changed formation, changed direction to fly north, and disappeared.   Totally silent, no noise.   This is my second sighting in my life. It was beautiful to watch.  They moved too fast to count the exact number, but I estimate 10-15. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Spotted an light much like a star but larger and green with subtle red light. Moved very erratically, changing direction master than an
records.story: Spotted an light much like a star but larger and green with subtle red light. Moved very erratically, changing direction master than any known air craft and accelerating to very high speeds in seconds and stopping abruptly.   Seen on the south side of city close to air force base but maneuvers were over city.  I have video recordings.

records.summary: THE SKY SOUTHEAST OF ABQ THERE WAS A GROUPING OF LIGHTS JUMPING IN ONE AREA FOR OVER AN HOUR
records.story: THE SKY SOUTHEAST OF ABQ THERE WAS A GROUPING OF LIGHTS JUMPING IN ONE AREA FOR OVER AN HOUR.  I USED BINOCULARS TO VIEW THIS UNUSUAL FLYING OBJECT THAT IS HARD TO DESCRIBE.  IT SEEMED TO HAVE THREE TO FOUR DIFFERENT COLORS

records.summary: I was facing to the Eastern sky at angle of 35 degrees rise from horizon.  The little dipper is to my left.  I am watching a jet high i
records.story: I was facing to the Eastern sky at angle of 35 degrees rise from horizon.  The little dipper is to my left.  I am watching a jet high in the sky when I see a bright light come on out to the right of the jet.  The light was bright but I could see that it was behind the jet.  Then the light came straight at me so fast it seemed to "ride" the light and approached me so fast and stopped suddenly in its tracks.  Then in a split second the light turned off and it looked rectangular and I could make it out by the reflection of the bright full moon.  It only seemed about a 1000 yards away.   Then in the next split second it appeared to "slingshot" itself back and to the left where it came from.  I could see the shape get smaller and smaller til it was gone!   I got the impression it was "stalking" the westbound jet I was initially watching.

records.summary: Unexplained "fireball" over albuquerque's west side.
records.story: Unexplained "fireball" over albuquerque's west side. This evening I left my parents house just before 7:30 pm.  I looked to the East where I saw what looked to be a hot air balloon.   After observing the object for a few seconds it began to move west towards my location, then began a smooth arc across the sky going south-West.  The Object was flickering slowly like a fire, bright orange.

records.summary: This was identical to the craft I saw one week earlier, spotted in the exact same area of sky on the south end of Albuquerque.
records.story: This was identical to the craft I saw one week earlier, spotted in the exact same area of sky on the south end of Albuquerque.  This time it accelerated and changed direction direction extremely fast emitting the same green light.  I have video of this as well.

records.summary: 12 sperate ghostly lights that flew in changing formations, with no sound.
records.story: 12 sperate ghostly lights that flew in changing formations, with no sound. I just saw a bunch of UFOs.  They just flew over my house in a formation of 12 and with no noise and they were lit up each with a very pale and faded orange glowing light.  When they flew over at about 300 ft in the air, they made no sound. I thought at first it was a large aircraft lit up with all the lights on the bottom in the shape of a triangle, then all the lights switched places, telling me it was 12 separate aircraft.  Man that was cool and scary at the same time. I always believed in them and I always had a feeling we are not alone, but I never had a reason to believe, until now. We are not alone, believe it.

records.summary: Pulsing light of red, green and white seen in western and southern sky over Albuquerque.
records.story: Pulsing light of red, green and white seen in western and southern sky over Albuquerque. I was stargazing on my porch that night because the sky was so clear.   At first I thought I was seeing a pulsing, twinkling star, but then it began to change colors rapidly, including red, green, and white.  The object would stay in one spot for a few seconds, then slowly move a short distance in random directions (up, down, left, right).   I called my adult son outside to see it because he had mentioned clearly seeing the same thing several nights in a row this week on his way back from work on a bicycle at 4 or 5 a.m. He confirmed that this was the same thing he had been sighting, but he had seen it in the southern part of the city near Kirtland AFB and the Albuquerque airport in the wee hours of the a.m.  His sightings also included purple as one of the colors. The light was directly west in the sky.  Our home is close to the exact center of the city near the crossing of I-25 and I-40.  Other events going on this week were the Albuquerque Balloon Fiesta, and fireworks the same night as my sighting.  However, the balloon events are held in the far north part of the city, nowhere close to where I clearly viewed this object. It had to be a distance of approximately 10 miles.

records.summary: 3 flashing green lights in formatiom of a triangle to big to.be stars
records.story: 3 flashing green lights in formatiom of a triangle to big to.be stars 3 bright lights to big to be stars flashing green lights.  One dissapeard then reappeard  the other 2 kept flashing.  They were in a formation of a triangle

records.summary: Extremely fast and agile green light over Albuquerque.
records.story: Extremely fast and agile green light over Albuquerque I saw what I thought to be a bright green satellite in the northern sky at about zenith.  As I watched with a friend it suddenly “shot” at extreme speed all the way to the western horizon, then back to origin.   It then appeared to be descending as it was growing larger and brighter.  After about 60 seconds, it shot again off to the south eastern horizon and then back.  After about another 30 seconds it shot at extreme speed north until it was lost below the horizon.   We watched for a few minutes and as it did not return we got into our cars.  Just as we did this it suddenly came back from below the northern horizon, paused about a third of the way across the sky and then shot again at a high rate of speed straight east.   Throughout the entire incident there was no sound.   It disappeared behind Sandia peak and did not return.

records.summary: Disc close enough to almost touch no sound or air, no feet or legs cloaked until about 6' from it
records.story: Disc close enough to almost touch no sound or air, no feet or legs cloaked until about 6' from it. In Oct, 1984 around 7:30pm while going to parent teacher meeting at Alvarado grade school in north valley of Albuquerque, NM, something very odd was experienced by myself.  Due to not enough parking in front of school I parked in the back side near the play ground.  As I was walking toward the classrooms suddenly there was something hanging in the air.  No sound at all, not sitting on any legs for feet, just hanging there and about 16 ft in diameter.  It was metallic with lights around the bottom in blue, yellow, red, green and purple.  I couldn’t believe what I was seeing so I walked back toward the car and it disappeared.  Walking toward the classrooms again and there it was once more.  It was as if it was cloaked in some way that unless you were within so many (6) feet of it, it wasn’t there at all.  While standing underneath it I tried to reach up and touch it but it was just high enough that it was out of my reach so about 6 feet high.  The upper part of it had w! hat appeared to be blackened windows. Suddenly a man came out of my daughters classroom walking very fast toward me.  I figured he had just got finished with his teacher meeting and also wondered why he had on sun glasses in the dark. He also had on a black suit, white shirt with thin black tie. I got his attention right away by requesting him to look at this, what is this?  Right away I could tell he was very nervous and asked me, look at what?  I said look at this medal thing just hanging here. He said it’s nothing and I said yes it is something what is it?  He said it’s for advertising.  It flies around advertising. I said to him that no it wasn’t for that at all, there was no sound and no air so it wasn’t a helicopter or airplane and it didn’t have any feet or legs; it was just floating there and we had nothing that would do that.  Again I tried to reach up to touch it and he looked at the window and nodded. What was that about? I had no idea.  Then something happened to me and to this day I don’t know if I went into my meeting with my daughters teacher or not.  Actually I don’t remember at all how I got home, it seems that months and months are still missing from my mind. To this day I feel that this man knew exactly what this was and that he had in fact came in that thing to his meeting. Either this man was an alien himself or someone working with them.  Of course that’s just a very strong feeling I have and also I believe that UFO’s are always there, right in front of us but we can’t see them unless we get within so many feet of them or if by chance light hits them in a certain way.  I know as fact that it was a UFO! I have no doubt about it at all.

records.summary: Two glowing green ovals over interstate 40 just West of Albuquerque.
records.story: Two glowing green ovals over interstate 40 just West of Albuquerque Westbound on the I40 at mile marker 224, a object flew slowly over the interstate at a low altitude.  There were two large green glowing ovals behind the craft and a flashing red beacon (which of course possibly signifies an aircraft of some kind).  I had never seen anything like it and have researched it myself on the internet and can find nothing like it.   It proceeded in a northwestern path until out of sight.  I could not make out what the vehicle might have been as the two green ovals are what really caught my eye.  The back drop of the dark clouds and the sheer darkness made the lights standout but made identifying the craft very difficult.

records.summary: 6-7 golden orbs in a V-formation like a flock of birds
records.story: 6-7 golden orbs in a V-formation like a flock of birds At first, I thought the formation of 6-7 golden lights was a flock of birds, but the sun had been down for a long time by this point, and the orbs were way too big and glowing to be birds.  Plus, it was super dark.  The V-formation was traveling towards the northeast, while I was facing north.  The group of lights looked about the size of 4 small moons, or one large harvest moon.   As the golden orbs traveled away, their triangular shape drifted into the distance until I could no longer see the objects.  A helicopter was in the area hovering around my house, one reason I had been looking up so much.  When I called  one of the news stations to report my UFO sighting, they said the helicopters were there because of a standoff, not because of what I had seen.

records.summary: Object appeared in photo after seeing military aircraft
records.story: Object appeared in photo after seeing military aircraft At approximately 10:35 several ( three to four) military fixed winged aircraft were seen flying in formation at approximately 1,000 feet over the western edge of the city of Albuquerque.  Both witnesses were in a moving vehicle heading South on I-25 when the military aircraft were observed.   Witnesses then turned east on I-40 and searched to the rear of the vehicle to continue observing military aircraft.  (Highly unusual to see C-130 type aircraft in formation although Kirtland AFB is home to many types of C-130's)  Military aircraft were not present in the sky, a picture was taken in the area believed to be the most likely spot for aircraft to be.   Image captured is not of any type of civilian or military aircraft and appears to be sphere or circular shape.

records.summary: Unexplainable steady light moves horizontally then disappears.
records.story: Unexplainable steady light moves horizontally then disappears. My son noticed 2 planes in the sky on our way home. I looked up to see them and I noticed the plane but the other light was brighter than a star and moving faster than the plane.  My first thoughts were that it was a falling star, but it was moving horizontally.  It did not have blinking lights like a plane. Then it just disappeared. I had to pull over and take a longer look to find it, but it was gone.    I made sure that wasn't seeing things by asking my son what he saw and he saw it disappear as well.

records.summary: Saw a kite-life UFO floating through the sky on Christmas Eve.
records.story: Saw a kite-life UFO floating through the sky on Christmas Eve. My friend and I were driving tonight, and then we decided to look up into the sky to look at the beautiful Christmas Eve stars.  While gazing, we saw a formation of some sort that almost looked like a flying net/kite that had lights placed at each edge/corner.  The object floated across the dark sky and changed shape while it flowed, with corners of lights swaying in and out.  After about a minute, the object was too far for our view.  It was a very interesting experience. ((NUFORC Note:  We have changed the date of the sighting.  PD))

records.summary: Bright cone with rings spinning around it, hovering for 50 minutes.
records.story: Bright cone with rings spinning around it, hovering for 50 minutes. Cone with rings of red, yellow, lights spinning around it.  Hovering, at one point it zipped and moved quickly back to a hovering state.

records.summary: No one believes us.....
records.story: I was standing out side my backyard smoking a cigarette near down town 6th st by loves gas station.   When i looked in the sky and noticed 5 red and orage lights.  They where in a roll the 1st one turned white...  but u could still see the objective.  I call my brother to whiteness the objective .   We stood looking at the objective for a couple mins. He then ran into the house to get his phone..  took a couple of photos..  later post in face book to see if any one eles who seen it... While we watched them slowly disappear. . After they disappear. .. He went inside 5 mins later 3 more appeared ... He came back out... But they disappeared faster then the 1st one... No one believes us............

records.summary: Twinkling string like light high up in the sky not surrounding by anything
records.story: Twinkling string like light high up in the sky not surrounding by anything We both looked up into the sky and noticed that there was a large (it seemed it could be miles long) string like golden light that twinkled and seemed to be getting longer as seconds passed.  It had no obvious source and the sky was clear at the moment.  Then suddenly it completely dissappeared at once without any sound, and without fading.  The light that was seen did not seem to be like anything that could oocur in nature.

records.summary: Bright light over Albuquerque.
records.story: Bright light over Albuquerque. I was outside my house when a bright light lit up the whole sky.   It looked like a police helicopter shined my brother and I with the spot light then I saw a bright blue ball falling towards the northern part of Albuquerque.   Then a few seconds later we heard a faint boom like it actually fell and hit the ground. ((NUFORC Note:  Date may be flawed.  We wonder whether the event might have occurred on the morning of Thursday, March 06th, 2014.  The source of the report elects to remain totally anonmymous, so we have no way of contacting him/her, to confirm.  PD))

records.summary: Bright, quick flashes of light directly above my house in Albuquerque.
records.story: Bright, quick flashes of light directly above my house in Albuquerque I was in my backyard, on the patio, and heard a hum, like an engine or generator starting up.   A couple of seconds later, about half of the yard became illuminated, without any sound, from a bright light directly overhead for maybe a second.   After that, a quicker flash of light illuminated a smaller area in the yard, again without sound, about twenty feet to the right of me, immediately followed by a even quicker flash of light.  The hum and flashes didn’t last longer than 5 seconds.   It was not a spotlight or the sweeping lights used to advertise a new nightclub opening.  No other houses or yards, as far as I can tell, were lit up.   The light was not far off in the distance; it seemed like it was right above me.   I did not see any objects at any time.   My home is near Constitution and Morris.

records.summary: I've seen crafts that make me think that we are big alone.
records.story: I've seen crafts that make me think that we are big alone. I live on the westside of Albuquerque at around eight o'clock pm I was walking home from downtown.  I saw a bright light in the sky above me a little more towards the west.   I stopped and started to stare at the object the more I looked the more detail I could make out.  The object had a very bright light on the bottom and smaller less bright lights that came off the top to a point like a pyramid.   After I got home I went out into the backyard to see it again that's when I noticed a second ship.  This one was more towards the southeast over Kirtland air force base.   I could tell they were high because I could see military and commercial aircraft fly under them.  Then my dog started running crazy and barking at the sky.  This scared me so I came inside and refused to go back out there.   I personally believe these were mother ships.

records.summary: Christmas Eve 2013 headed South leaving Albuquerque, saw a craft that looked like a spinning top with rings spinning around it,
records.story: Christmas Eve 2013 headed South leaving Albuquerque, saw a craft that looked like a spinning top with rings spinning around it, My fiance and I were leaving Albuquerque headed South.  We looked at the sky and saw a flying craft that looked like a spinning top or a cone with different colored rings spinning around it.  The rings were red and yellow.  It hovered in one spot far away in the horizon toward Arizona.  We could not believe what we were seeing. We saw it in the sky hovering and I thought maybe it was a helicopter.  No Way!  The way it was moving no craft that we know of or have seen moved like this UFO.  I got to take pictures of it with my phone.  There was a moment where it stopped hovering and went forward then again continued hovering until we reached Belen.

records.summary: Bright reddish gold object seen in Albuquerque NM FIVE MINS after midnite on new years 2014.
records.story: bright reddish gold object seen in Albuquerque, NM  FIVE MINS after midnite on new years 2014 Went outside to look around the sky for new years then off to the south I saw what appeared as a extremely bright star.it appeared to slowly move towards us then it excelled going west.  As it was going west it kinda disappeared but you can still see it, at least the shape of it it looked oval in shape and appeared reflective.

records.summary: Still lights in a row with no movement for 30 or so seconds.
records.story: Still lights in a row with no movement for 30 or so seconds extremely bright horizontally close 2 white lights, a 3rd orange light a 4th white light, no movement for 30 seconds above east mountains, then vanished. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: I saw a bright orange oval shape that moved slightly and disappeared with no flash nor sound.
records.story: I saw a bright orange oval shape that moved slightly and disappeared with no flash nor sound. I was standing in backyard near downtown Albuquerque, N.M., Sunday evening (2/23/14): I glanced up at Orion and saw this bright light which in less than a minute vanished.  It was very orange in color and was round.  It traveled slightly, in a crescent moon shape and disappeared.  No flashing; no sound.  Appeared high in sky with belt of Orion in background.  It was definitely far away and as bright as any surrounding star/planet. Thought it odd and added it to my life list of odd sightings and 'let it go' but have decided to file a report after seeing pretty much exactly what I saw, mentioned in this sighting's report:  http://www.nuforc.org/webreports/107/S107250.html

records.summary: Cylindrical shape with amber colored lights hovering near Route 66.
records.story: Cylindrical shape with amber colored lights hovering near Route 66 On Wednesday, January 1, 2014 at 1:00 a.m., I was the passenger in a vehicle driving westbound on Route 66 (Central Ave), just passing Unser Blvd.  I looked toward the west-southwest direction and in the distance, saw a cylindrical shape with approximately 6 amber colored lights hovering about 50 feet about the ground. Thinking it was a helicopter, I glanced over at my husband and asked why there would be a helicopter preparing to land on the next block.  By the time I looked again, the figure was gone. When we reached the area where the “helicopter” would have been, there was no sign of anything going on.  Traffic was light and nothing in the sky to suggest anything Earthly explainable.

records.summary: My mom who was up late last night and described an illumination very bright light from the sky which lit up her neighborhood.
records.story: My mom who was up late last night and  described an illumination very bright light from the sky which lit up her neighborhood all around her and surrounding houses.   She lives in the area of Adams and Candelaria,  what was so strange was there was no sound at all just very bright light (like you could work on your car out there).   Strange,  any ideas?  ps no choppers or police seen and no, it was not a police officer checking yards.   It came from the sky but total silence and very bright.

records.summary: The craft was no any commercial or military aircraft I've ever seen.
records.story: The craft was no any commercial or military aircraft I've ever seen. While traveling north on Tramway Road, also known as State Road 556, I observed an egg shape object traveling north along the Sandia Mountains.  The craft was traveling at a slow speed at first.  I stopped my vehicle and watched the craft fly just above the Sandia Tram and then stop.  The craft then flew west directly over my vehicle and the road. Several other vehicles traveling on Tramway stopped because of this craft.  The craft then changed to a south easterly direction and flew towards Kirtland AFB.

records.summary: My fiancé and I began to hear a resonating  loud humming noise.  The hum was omni directional.
records.story: Randomly my fiancé and I began to hear a resonating  loud humming noise.  The hum was omni-directional.  The sound clearly appeared to be coming from above.   We could not pinpoint its location but it seemed to be moving.   This sound was unlike anything we had heard before.  We checked the skies and did not see anything visible .

records.summary: 2 orange/red lights in a line were traveling North
records.story: 2 orange/red lights in a line were traveling North 2 large lights that were the color of fire were hovering in the Northwest corner of Albuquerque.  My husband originally thought they were helicopters but we could not hear anything. We drove under the lights as they were traveling about 100 MPH due North.  All of a sudden they disappeared before I could film them.  They were traveling/hovering in a  linear fashion.

records.summary: Five lights plusing over ABQ sky.
records.story: Five lights plusing over ABQ sky. My aunt, mom and I were waiting for Target to open at 8 for black Friday.  We sat in the car waiting because it was freezing.  I happened to notice these lights and I pointed it out to my aunt and mom.  We all looked at the lights and then we noticed they all started slowly moving.  At first, we only noticed three little lights, but then after a while we noticed two more not as close.  All of these five lights seemed to be pulsing slowly, they would pulsate to a really bright light to a duller light.  The three lights seemed to be moving slowly in sync with each other.  They did not have a distinct shape but they seemed to move together towards the sky; I did not believe it was a comet or an airplane.  Slowly they would pulse bright and then dimmer until one disappeared.  They all disappeared one right after another, one at a time.  This was less than five minutes and it seemed like they moved a far distance in the sky but they moved very slowly.

records.summary: Falling lights.
records.story: Falling lights. On the fourth of November at approximately 20:00 I left my house after my television spontaneously switched channels.  Outside there was a ball of blue light falling from the sky far above the clouds near the city of Albuquerque on the eastern side close to the mountain.  Once it entered into the clouds the light could be seen to be a blue and green pulsating ball of light with a trail of white smoke behind it which was so pale it looked like steam.  It moved so fast, and appeared to be so large I expected to feel the impact, but I felt nothing.   About five minutes later three to five search planes began circling the area where light crashed and remained searching for at least an hour. There was no report of this incident, and I appear to be alone in this sighting.   If anyone else saw this event please step forward and provide a report. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides little contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Triangle shaped hovering lights.
records.story: Triangle shaped hovering lights. One large triangle shaped light formation, 3 bright white lights, one blue and one red.  Hovering about 300 feet over housing area.  "Chased" two smaller lights.  The larger light shot forward , disappeared and reappeared going in the opposite direction.  The smaller lights moved after it.  Shortly after this happened three military aircrafts flew in the direction of the sighting. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: While getting off freeway on Eubank exit a bright flash of light went in front of car had to brake apparently vehicle next to us disapp
records.story: While getting off freeway on Eubank exit a bright flash of light went in front of car had to brake apparently vehicle next to us disappeared all other cars around us were all looking around in shock and everyone left area in hurry all of us really scared ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: A flickering clump of lights, alternating green, red, white, and occasionally blue.. Due east, high above Sandia Mtns.  Stationary.
records.story: A flickering clump of lights, alternating green, red, white, and occasionally blue.. Due east, high above Sandia Mtns.  Stationary. 10-19-13:  ~ 2300  My hubby and I were sitting on the patio facing the Sandia Mtn range, in Rio Rancho, looking at the stars.  I noticed a flickering light, due east over the mountain, and thought it was a plane coming in straight towards us.  But it didn't change.  It remained in the same spot for at least 15 minutes.   I'd grabbed the binoculars, and it was hard to determine a shape, because of the constantly flickering colors.  But it appeared to have 5-6 alternately flickering "lights", with predominately green, red and white colors, occasionally a flash of blue.   It did not move, and we went inside, concluding that it must be a ballon or weather craft. Has anyone else experienced this?

records.summary: This morning, while stopped at a red light at Academy and Wyoming, I noticed what looked like an airplane at 35000 feet (traveling NE),
records.story: This morning, while stopped at a red light at Academy and Wyoming, I noticed what looked like an airplane at 35000 feet (traveling NE), only it was much too fat vertically to be an airplane (especially at the perceived altitude), but it was moving like one.  I pointed it out to my wife, and she thought it was too fat to be an airplane, and then it just disappeared. It is difficult to describe what we saw, and other than its appearance of flying as an airplane, we couldn’t fully grasp what we were looking at.  It was glowing as though the sun, at sunset,  was reflecting off of it, but it was 11:00 A.M.. This sighting happened at the same location where my wife and I had seen a UFO a few years ago that we reported, which at first looked like a white balloon (across the street from Whole Foods on Wyoming and Academy in Albuquerque).

records.summary: Like an average star but binoculars show it to be strong flashing lights of white, blue, red.  ((NUFORC Note:  "Twinkling" star?  PD))
records.story: Looks like an average star but binoculars (10x) show it to be strong flashing lights of white, blue, red. The sighting looks a lot like a star, but when I look through binoculars I can see flashing lights of different colors.  Red, white, blue, yellow.  The twinkling mimics a star but stars shine with much subtler twinkling.  This is the second night that I have seen this.   This UFO is 20 degrees north of west.  I estimate that it is west of Albuquerque and very high in the sky.  It seems to just sit in one spot in the night sky.  The object is about 10 to 15 degrees above the western horizon.  I could be wrong.   Is there a bright star in this location in the morning sky at this time? ((NUFORC Note:  We suspect a sighting of a "twinkling" star, but cannot be certain which one the witnesses might have been observing.  PD))

records.summary: Orange-red light followed by a blinking green and red light; large rumbling noise unlike a plane could be heard.
records.story: Orange-red light followed by a blinking green and red light; large rumbling noise unlike a plane could be heard. Background:  I am an elementary school teacher and I live in Albuquerque.  I have seen unusual objects in the sky before, but primarily in my hometown of Santa Fe.  I am a frequent sky-watcher.  Living near an airport, I am very familiar with objects that are identifiable, like planes and helicopters and how they move and what lights they emit as well as sounds they make traveling overhead. I went out to my backyard to check on my dog.  I looked up as I always do to check out the stars.  I was looking at the east sky when I noticed what looked like a star, a white light, moving slowly straight up in the sky. I then saw a blinking green light positioned vertically under it, also moving up. The lights changed position. They moved from being vertical to being horizontal to the sky line.  When this happened the white light changed color: turned orange-red.  The blinking green light began blinking red then green. The began to move faster, as they picked up speed I could hear what sounded similar to plane noises, but different, almost a rumble.  The sound was loud compared to their distance away from my house.  I am used to hearing plane engine noise as I live near Double Eagle Airport, which is about 10 miles from my house.  Normally when the sound is as loud as I heard it, the planes appear closer to my location. The objects were traveling due west,not Northwest, which is where the airport is located from my house.. As the two objects began to travel west, dogs all over started barking as it flew overhead.  My own dogs were appearing agitated and looking up at the sky. They traveled together; leading was the orange-red light that was not blinking at all, followed by the blinking red and green light. I fixed my eyes on the space between the lights and something seemed fuzzy about the space in between, almost as if there was something being masked in the middle. They begin to travel pretty quick.  I ran inside and then to the front yard which faces west.  I was able to watch them travel west until I could no longer make out the lights.

records.summary: White sphere descends from sky in the Bosque.
records.story: White sphere descends from sky in the Bosque. I was driving on Coors heading south from Alameda when I saw an extremely bright object in the sky that looked to be slowly dropping elevation.  I pulled over to try and get the object on video as it hovered just above some houses near the Rio Grande River.  As I watched, the light dropped below the houses where it seemed to land in the wooded area near the river.  This is when I lost view of the object.  The entire time the object never made a sound and was much brighter than any lights on traditional aircraft.   The link below is my video of the experience. http://youtu.be/TuxyrprUXt8 ((NUFORC Note:  Witness confirms that the sighting occurred on March 09, 2014.

records.summary: A redish-orange sphere that appeared to glow or be on fire fell out of the sky towards the ground.
records.story: A redish-orange sphere that appeared to glow or be on fire fell out of the sky towards the ground. Around 9:00 p.m., my mother and I were standing outside her house in Albuquerque, NM, facing south.  It was dark and somewhat cloudy outside.   We were looking upwards at an airplane in the sky and commenting on the fact that it seemed to be flying low and outside of the normal flight patterns we have seen.   As we were watching the plane, we both witness an object appear to fall from the sky.  The object was much further south than the plane, so we knew it was not at all associated with the plane.   The object was round and reddish-orange and appeared to either be glowing or on fire.  It was about the size of the moon, although it certainly wasn't the moon, which was overhead.   It fell from the clouds towards the ground.  A house across the street obstructed the view so we did not see it land.   The entire process took 3-4 seconds total.   My mother was so surprised she actually cursed.   Following the sighting we did not hear or see anything else for several minutes.

records.summary: UFO follows jet.  ((NUFORC Note:  Witness is experienced amateur astronomer.  PD))
records.story: UFO follows jet I am an older experienced astronomer and observer.   While watching the sun with my solar scope I saw a 737  jet at high altitude pass right through the field of view with the sun silhouetting the shape of the jet.   Behind the jet was a disc shaped object following between the contrails of the jet engines.  I saw the disc wobbling behind the jet from the turbulence of the jet.   I'm sure I would not have seen it except for the brilliance of the sun behind it.  It was less than half the size of the 737.

records.summary: 7 lights hover over the Base and Sandias.
records.story: 7 lights hover over the Base and Sandias. 7 yellowish/ redish circular lights hovered in a single line formation with one light ahead of the pact as   it was leading these lights from kirtland air force base to the east/south corner of the Sandra mountains.  Lasted for about 1 minute then just like they appeared they disappeared.

records.summary: Bright light in Albuquerque, NM (10/19/2014)
records.story: bright light in Albuquerque NM (10/19/2014) Looking out my window and noticed odd bright light and watched it and noticed that it was moving and flashing brighter and then dim out.  Took a few pictures of it. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Flashing objects over Albuquerque skies.
records.story: flasing objects over Albuquerque skies At 7:00 pm me & my son saw 3 seperate objects with blinking lights over Albuquerque.  At first, they were in a triangle position hovering and then were hovering side by side in a straight line this went on for about 30 minutes.

records.summary: Saw formation of a lot shape with bright orange lights hovering over Albuquerque  airport area.  All were little then faded.
records.story: Saw formation of a lot shape with bright orange lights hovering over Albuquerque airport area.  All were little then faded to only lower craft near ground. ((ADDENDUM FROM WITNESS)) It happened about 7:45pm Friday evening.  When walking outside, I looked south towards the southeast.  I am guessing the lights were past the airport and had a bright orange/ reddish to them.  Not blinking or strobing but a strong glow to them.  As all were lit the formation was a "L"-ish figure up high, with a count of thirteen glowing lights individually synced.  I called my Friend to hurry come look when they finally saw what I did the upper part was not lit and the lower five that were horizontal were.   It lasted for about 15-30 sec. I checked to see if the news or anything was reported the following day and nothing was there I just switched off my phone so I was not able to take a picture but looked up strange lights in the sky on google.  There were some similarities to the glowing orange/reddish light in Dallas, Texas. as what the description said.  Thank you ((initials deleted)) ((END ADDENDUM))

records.summary: Green fireball streaking across sky in Albuquerque, NM.
records.story: Green fireball streaking across sky in Albuquerque, NM. My Girlfriend, her Daughter and I were heading North on Unser blvd this evening (11/7/14) and witnessed a Large Green fireball streaking across the sky of the west mesa here in Albuquerque.  We witnessed this at 6:18 pm.

records.summary: Oval cloudlike only spot in day blue sky then see more silver color slowing moving,then disappear
records.story: oval cloudlike only spot in day blue sky then see more silver color slowing moving,then disappear driving west towards sandia mountains in Albuquerque Loomas ave in 1 pm day, blue sky, see oval cloud small,all alone, moving very slowly, see outline oval of cloud, grey line?  turns more silver incloud, faint outline.  moving away some, more silver greyish now; put head down to drive 20 seconds and gone, clear blue sky.no trace no wind 67 deg. sunny. not a plane.not enuf time to land plane and make a big turn to airbase/port.never seen this before.

records.summary: Looked like a bright white circular object with no movement in the sky. As the sun went down it turned reddish orange.
records.story: Looked like a bright white circular object with no movement in the sky.  As the sun went down it turned reddish orange. ((NUFORC Note:  We suspect that the object was a hig-altitude, helium-filled balloon.  One was reported to have been released from Ft. Sumner in New Mexico.  http://www.topix.com/city/fort-sumner-nm/2014/09/enormous-balloon-will-carry-black-hole-hunting-telescope-aloft PD)) ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Aircraft shaped like a sine curve, with a green neon light tracing its edges.
records.story: Aircraft shaped like a sine curve with a green neon light tracing its edges. Around 11:00pm on December 3, 2014, I was hanging out with a close friend and his girlfriend at a park on the east side of Albuquerque.  We were walking around the park and heard something that sounded like a mixture between a jet engine and a helicopter.  We all looked up and saw a fairly large, slow moving craft flying pretty low.  We can only describe the craft as a black object with the shape of a sine curve, or something like a pringle chip with upward arches as the wings.   Although the craft blended in with the sky, we could clearly see its shape due to a smooth, bright green, neon light tracing the edges in that exact shape.  The final detail was a large, orange, slow blinking light on the back of it. We were near my house and I was headed home a few minutes after the sighting and I told my mom about it because it had been heading in the direction of our neighbourhood.  She said that a few minutes before I had arrived she heard the exact same sound and that the noise had shaken the whole house.  She described the sound as a plane about to land right above our roof.  I have been doing research since last night on any aircraft with that sort of shape but have found nothing. ((ADDENDA/RESPONSES FROM WITNESS)) #1 Thanks for the quick response!  The only lights were the large orange one and the solid green light tracing the shape of the craft.  I am an art student fortunately, but don't have much experience drawing vehicles.  I will definitely do my best to include an image by this weekend if not tomorrow.  #2 Hello, This is basically what it looked like from our perspective with a neighborhood across the road and the faint outline of the mountains in the background.  It seemed to be less than 1 or 2 miles away and fairly low to the ground considering it shook our house.  Again I believe the craft was black because it blended in to the background but the green and orange lights were what we could see perfectly.  Not sure if it is some sort of military aircraft or anything but I couldn't find any sort of craft with that shape.   Thanks!   #3 Great! That's fine with me.  I don't have really any knowledge of planes or military aircraft but the three of us got a little freaked out and couldn't think of anything it could have been.  ((END ADDENDUM)) ((NUFORC Note:  We have received a high-quality image from the source of the report, and have posted it to our homepage at www.ufocenter.com.  PD))

records.summary: Saw white circle high in the sky. Noticed two hours later it was still there in the exact same spot. No movement at all. As night appro
records.story: Saw white circle high in the sky.  Noticed two hours later it was still there in the exact same spot.  No movement at all.   As night approaches it has changed in color from a bright white to yellow and now a blue.   It has been nearly three hours now and still has not moved at all.   It has caught everyone's attention in the city. ((NUFORC Note:  We suspect that the object was a hig-altitude, helium-filled balloon.  One was reported to have been released from Ft. Sumner in New Mexico.  http://www.topix.com/city/fort-sumner-nm/2014/09/enormous-balloon-will-carry-black-hole-hunting-telescope-aloft PD)) ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.story: White/red ligth on North Side of Albuquerque 9/13/14 Light on north side of Albuquerque.  Went from large white orb shape to large red orb shape and then quickly turned small to where it was about the size of a star.  Probably a planet or solar flares. Was very bright and had an aura/blur around it, once viewed thru a slit could see regular round shape. ((NUFORC Note:  We suspect that the object was a hig-altitude, helium-filled balloon.  One was reported to have been released from Ft. Sumner in New Mexico.  http://www.topix.com/city/fort-sumner-nm/2014/09/enormous-balloon-will-carry-black-hole-hunting-telescope-aloft PD)) ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Bright round object in the Northwestern sky above Rio Rancho, NM.  ((NUFORC Note:  High-altitude, helium-filled balloon.  PD))
records.story: We saw a bright round object in the Northwestern sky above Rio Rancho, NM, on  9/18/2014 around  7:40pm…. It was not blinking, nor flashing.  The light was a very bright, I’d guess 5500 Degrees Kelvin. The object never moved and appeared to fade after sunset.   We watched it from the B of A parking lot on the corner of 528/Coors. There were several people that pulled over to watch this object; I thought for sure I’d hear something about it on the news or web search. ((NUFORC Note:  Date and time provided by witness are flawed.  We have amended both, to reflect a sighting at 19:40 hrs. on September 13, 2014, the day that what we believe was a high-altitude balloon was reported to our Center.  PD)) ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD)) ((NUFORC Note:  We suspect that the object was a high-altitude, helium-filled balloon.  One was reported to have been released from Ft. Sumner in New Mexico.  http://www.topix.com/city/fort-sumner-nm/2014/09/enormous-balloon-will-carry-black-hole-hunting-telescope-aloft PD))

records.summary: Reddish-orange light seen in Northwest Albuquerque disappears before hitting treeline.
records.story: Reddish-orange light seen in Northwest Albuquerque disappears before hitting treeline Reddish-orange light appeared to be decending in the northern sky.  The object was seen from Ventana Village Rd and Rainbow Blvd in the Ventana Ranch area of Northern Albuquerque.  Only one object was seen.    Another aircraft was in the same vicinity as the object, emitting a red and blue flashing light as a normal plane would.   This aircraft was clearly a plane.    After about 10 seconds of watching the unknown object, the light began to appear more faint.    The light from the object appeared to vanish before hitting the treeline.   We drove our vehicle to Irving Blvd where we had a clear view of the sky to the north,  but the object was gone.   We could still see the same aircraft that was near the unknown object further out in the sky,  but not the unknown object.

records.summary: Mysterious lights over west mesa in Albuquerque.
records.story: Mysterious lights over west mesa in Albuquerque. Low on the west horizon as sun was setting a bright light appeared, hovered and the dimmed out multiple times.   At one point light appeared above jet. Jet was displaying contrails, the light was not.   Light once again faded out and the reappeared further south from jet.

records.summary: Bright double-flash over Albuquerque's west side at 4:42 A.M MDT on September 8, 2014.
records.story: Bright double-flash over Albuquerque's west side at 4:42 A.M MDT on September 8, 2014 At approximately 4:42 A.M. this morning, September 8, 2014, I was lying in my bed on Albuquerque, NM’s, west side waiting for 4:44 A.M, the time I get up every day.  I was on my back, facing my bedroom window, which is on the west side of the house, when through the partially-opened blinds I witnessed an extremely bright double flash of white light that appeared to come from the west-southwest at an angle of approximately 40 degrees above the horizon. The second flash, which instantaneously followed the first, was well-defined, circular, and appeared to be brighter but smaller than the sun, momentarily lighting up the entire outdoors as if it were daylight.  I would estimate the duration at approximately one second. The double flash was not accompanied or followed by any sound whatsoever that I could detect.  Since I have never before witnessed anything resembling this, I cannot estimate the distance of its origin. I could not find anything in the news this morning regarding this event, but I did find this web site and thought it was worth a post.

records.summary: Another evening of mysterious lights over west mesa in Albuquerque.
records.story: Another evening of mysterious lights over west mesa in Albuquerque. Once again in the evening at 19:24 lights suddenly appeared bright and then visibly dimming. This time there were 2 lights. Movement slightly erratic.  There was a jet close by the occurrence showing staggering contrails but flying straight up. Location is low on the west mesa horizon.  Due to cloud cover the when the lights went behind the cloud we lost visibility but the lights didn't reappear out of the clouds instead they reappeared a distance away from the cloud and suddenly. Tomorrow we will be watching again and hopefully I can capture video.

records.summary: 14 pulsating fireballs over Albuquerque emitting strange sounds
records.story: 14 pulsating fireballs over Albuquerque emitting strange sounds 14 pulsating fireball UFO'S seen over Albuquerque on Jan 12th 2015.  They were spotted at 7:45 pm and were present for about 20 minutes.  They came from the south and headed northwesterly. They merged together at certain points, and seemed to just blend away into the night sky opposed to speeding up and flying away. We were able to get video footage, and noticed the distinct sounds of moving water and insects upon viewing, however, we were in Albuquerque proper where neither of those things were present.  I believe the sounds were emanating from the ships. I've been witness to quite a few sighting over the years, but never one so blatant. How no one else took notice, i don't know, but they were definitely noticeable, and not of this world.  That I know. I'd also like to mention that out of all the sightings I've been witness too, this is the first one where I had no sense of euphoria during or afterwards, was not compelled in anyway, and my phone didn't die or shut off, which is why I was able to obtain footage.

records.summary: Triangle UFO over Albuquerque.
records.story: Triangle UFO over Albuquerque At about 8:oo pm on January 20th, 2015, my girlfriend was currently exiting my house to go home after hanging out since early in the afternoon that day.  Her mom was parked out front and as they were leaving, I received a text to go outside and look at the sky.   I then went immediately outside and observed an object shaped like a triangle with 3 bright lights at each corner of the craft. it was moving at a very low rate of speed at low altitudes.   After watching the craft for about 5 minutes, it zoomed off with no sound or sign that it was ever in the sky in the first place.   I've seen numerous amounts of planes in my life and this... was not a plane.
